data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Das, Sunandan, Campbell, Patrick D., Deuti, Kaushik, Bag, Probhat, Raha, Sujoy (2019): A contribution to the systematics of Salea anamallayana (Beddome, 1878) and S. horsfieldii Gray, 1845 (Squamata: Agamidae: Draconinae). Zootaxa 4563 (3): 563-583, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4563.3.9|2 occurrences
